name: National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL). 2013. Coal cleaning; Underground mine
description:
DESCRIPTION
The amount of electricity required to power equipment used for cleaning coal at underground and surface mines as well as accounting for coal loss during production activities.

CITATION AND ASSOCIATED DOCUMENTATION
This document should be cited as: 
National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL). 2013. NETL Life Cycle Inventory Data – Unit Process: Coal cleaning; Undergrund mine. U.S. Department of Energy, National Energy Technology Laboratory. Last Updated: July 2013 (version 01). Retrieved on [DATE] from [URL for this dataset].

This dataset is part of the NETL Unit Process Library.  The Library offers additional information concerning this dataset in the form of a Detailed Spreadsheet  Documentation (DS) file and a Process Documentation File (DF).  The DS file  is an Excel file that contains all of the parameters, inputs, and outputs for a given system as well as background data, calculations and quality scores.  The DF file is a PDF document that contains major assumptions and data sources that are the basis for each unit process.  The NETL Unit Process Library is located on the NETL website (netl.doe.gov) under Research / Energy Analysis / Energy Trends and Issues / Life Cycle Analysis / Unit Process Library.

This dataset was converted directly from the DS with additional supporting information provided by the DF.  Full citations for the DS and DF are given below.

DS File
National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL). 2013. NETL Life Cycle Inventory Data – Unit Process: Coal cleaning; Undergrund mine. U.S. Department of Energy, National Energy Technology Laboratory. Last Updated: July 2013 (version 01).  Retrieved on 09/15/2015 from: http://www.netl.doe.gov/File%20Library/Research/Energy%20Analysis/Life%20Cycle%20Analysis/UP_Library/DS_Stage1_O_Coal_Cleaning_2013-02.xlsx%20Analysis/UP_Library/DS_Stage1_O_Extraction_Underground_2013-01.xlsx

DF File
National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL). 2013. NETL Life Cycle Inventory Data – Unit Process: Coal cleaning; Undergrund mine. U.S. Department of Energy, National Energy Technology Laboratory. Last Updated: July 2013 (version 01).  Retrieved on 09/15/2015 from: http://www.netl.doe.gov/File%20Library/Research/Energy%20Analysis/Life%20Cycle%20Analysis/UP_Library/DF_Stage1_O_Coal_Cleaning_2013-02.pdf
